articles.description: CARE was incorporated in 1997 as a single speciality Cardiac Hospital in Hyderabad with 100 beds and 20 cardiologists. Since then, the group has evolved exponentially to become one of India's leading multi-speciality hospital network with a focus on tier 2 ci…
articles.content:
Private equity firm TPG-backed Hyderabad-based hospital chain CARE Hospitals said it has acquired majority stake in Aurangabad-based United CIIGMA Hospitals for Rs 300-Rs 400 crore.

articles.author: ET Online
articles.title: Patra Chawl Land scam: ED gets 4 days custody of Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Raut
articles.description: According to news agency ANI, Raut was summoned four times but he appeared before the agency only once. During this, he tried to tamper with the evidence and key witnesses, said ED's lawyer. Earlier, ED sought 8-day custody of Sanjay Raut.
articles.content:
A special court on Monday granted Enforcement Directorate (ED) the custody of Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Raut till August 4 in connection with Patra Chawl land scam case.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Kia Motors wholesales in July rise 47 pc to 22,022 units
articles.description: "Gradual improvement in the supply chain and our customers' continued love for the brand is adding momentum to Kia India's growth," Kia India Vice President & Head of Sales and Marketing Hardeep Singh Brar said in a statement. This year, the company is outpac…
articles.content:
Kia Motors on Monday said its wholesales increased by 47 per cent to 22,022 units in July as compared with the same month last year. The company had dispatched 15,016 units in July 2021.

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Ukraine seeks to retake the south, tying down Russian forces
articles.description: Even as Moscow's war machine crawls across Ukraine's east, trying to achieve the Kremlin's goal of securing full control over the country's industrial heartland, Ukrainian forces are scaling up attacks to reclaim territory in the Russian-occupied south.

articles.title: Sensex extends gains to 4th day, ends 545 pts higher; Nifty tops 17,300
articles.description: Closing Bell: Sensex extends gains to 4th day, ends 545 pts higher; Nifty tops 17,300; Tata Motors rallies 7%, M&M 6%
